title: Run All Night (2015) CAMRip [RUS]
description:
Run All Night (2015) CAMRip [RUS]


Audio language - RUSSIAN!!!


Storyline:
Professional Brooklyn hitman Jimmy Conlon is more commonly known as THE GRAVEDIGGER. Jimmy was a mob hit-man, who was best friends with his boss Sean Maguire. But when Jimmy's son, Michael, is marked for death by the mob, Jimmy must go up against Sean to protect Michael at all costs. Together, he and Michael must avoid corrupt cops, contract killers and the mob to survive the night.


Review by pat-46946:
I'm just your average movie goer who sees one newly released film a week. It is a lunch outing with my best friend. We have been doing this for a couple of years. This movie, RUN ALL NIGHT kept me on the edge of my seat from start to finish. The script was average, the editing very good, the camera work great, the music terrific, and the acting was phenomenal! It is the only film in two years I want to see again. Go,you won't be disappointed. There is a great car chase that can hold its own with the best. It's a gangster movie, so expect lots of shoot-em-up scenes. Gory as they were, they were consistent with all the scenes in the film, so after a a short time they became inconsequential and I focused on the amazing acting.
